trans-unit.source: A base class that represents syndication content.
trans-unit.target: 表示新聞訂閱內容的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: 這是抽象類別，而且無法直接將其具現化。

trans-unit.source: It is used as the base class for the following syndication content types:
trans-unit.target: 它可用來做為下列新聞訂閱內容類型的基底類別：

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> instance to use to initialize the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 用來初始化新執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> 執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attribute extensions for this content.
trans-unit.target: 取得此內容的屬性延伸。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains the attribute extensions for this object.
trans-unit.target: 字典，其中包含此物件屬性延伸的集合。

trans-unit.source: Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications.
trans-unit.target: 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，

trans-unit.source: The syndication object model allows you to add custom attributes to a syndication content type (for example, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent>).
trans-unit.target: 新聞訂閱物件模型可讓您新增自訂屬性至新聞訂閱內容類型 (例如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent>)。

trans-unit.source: When serialized to Atom 1.0, these attributes appear within the `<content>` element.
trans-unit.target: 序列化為 Atom 1.0 時，這些屬性會在 `<content>` 項目中出現。

trans-unit.source: When serialized to RSS 2.0, these attribute are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 序列化為 RSS 2.0 時，這些屬性都會遭忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following XML shows how a custom attribute added to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent> instance is serialized to Atom 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 下列 XML 會說明新增至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent> 執行個體的自訂屬性，如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> 執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> 執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容的文字。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> instance with the specified HTML content.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 HTML 內容，建立新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The string passed into this method should contain HTML.
trans-unit.target: 傳入此方法的字串應包含 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The plain text content.
trans-unit.target: 純文字內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> instance with the specified plain text content.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的純文字內容建立新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容的媒體類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.UrlSyndicationContent" /> instance with the specified <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> and media type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.UrlSyndicationContent" /> 和媒體類型，建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.UrlSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.UrlSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The media type parameter can be set to any known MIME type value as defined in [RFC 2046](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95720).
trans-unit.target: 媒體型別參數可以設定為任何已知的 MIME 類型值，如中所定義[RFC 2046](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95720)。

trans-unit.source: The XHTML content.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> instance with the specified XHTML content.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 XHTML 內容，建立新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data contract object.
trans-unit.target: 資料合約物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> instance with the specified data contract object.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的資料合約物件，建立新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data contract object.
trans-unit.target: 資料合約物件。

trans-unit.source: The data contract serializer.
trans-unit.target: 資料合約序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> instance with the specified data contract object and data contract serializer.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的資料合約物件及資料合約序列化程式，建立新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object.
trans-unit.target: 物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: XML 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> instance with the specified object and XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 以指定物件與 XML 序列化程式，建立新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates XML syndication content.
trans-unit.target: 建立 XML 新聞訂閱內容。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> class that contains the new content.
trans-unit.target: 包含新內容之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the syndication content type.
trans-unit.target: 取得新聞訂閱內容類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type of syndication content.
trans-unit.target: 新聞訂閱內容類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property is abstract, so it must be accessed on an instance of a syndication content type (a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent>).
trans-unit.target: 此屬性為抽象，因此必須在新聞訂閱內容類型的執行個體上存取 (自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent>衍生的類別)。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework defines the following syndication content types:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會定義下列新聞訂閱內容類型：

trans-unit.source: This class contains a number of static helper methods for creating the various types of syndication content:
trans-unit.target: 此類別包含許多靜態 Helper 方法，用來建立各種類型的新聞訂閱內容：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的目標 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> object to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent" /> 物件的內容寫入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method only writes the content contained in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只會寫入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent>所含內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的目標 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of this object to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> within the specified element and element namespace.
trans-unit.target: 將此物件的內容寫入指定項目與項目命名空間中，指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 內。

trans-unit.source: The content contained in this object is written within the specified outer element.
trans-unit.target: 將此物件包含的內容寫入指定外部項目中。
